hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #4# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Epona's Song#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Forest Temple Boss Key# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: Master, there is a 0 percent chance that this hint is useful in any way.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #an Ocarina#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Stick#.
